snippet: On Friday night the New York Philharmonic offered an all-Tchaikovsky program as part of its Summertime Classics series, including the rarely performed Second Piano Concerto.
abstract: Vivien Schweitzer reviews concert of Tchaikovsky works performed by the New York Philharmonic at Avery Fisher Hall.
lead_paragraph: On Friday night the New York Philharmonic offered an all-Tchaikovsky program as part of its Summertime Classics series, including the rarely performed Second Piano Concerto.

headline.seo: New York Philharmonic Plays Tchaikovsky at Avery Fisher Hall
